Name: assign_worker_to_team
Description: Decision to assign a specific worker to a specific team

Name: select_feature_for_sprint
Description: Decision to include a specific feature in a sprint's backlog

Name: allocate_budget_to_feature
Description: Amount of budget to allocate for the development of a specific feature

Name: set_sprint_duration
Description: Duration of a sprint in days

Name: assign_task_to_worker
Description: Decision to assign a specific task to a specific worker

Name: prioritize_feature_backlog
Description: Priority ranking of a feature in the product backlog

Name: set_worker_availability
Description: Percentage of time a worker is allocated to the project

Name: plan_release_date
Description: Planned date for a specific release

Name: define_team_size
Description: Number of workers in a specific team

Name: estimate_task_effort
Description: Estimated effort for a task in person-hours

Name: set_feature_story_points
Description: Story points assigned to a user story for estimation
